channel.title: Alien Swarm won't start
channel.description:
So, i have a problem with Alien Swarm. When i start it, the "Preparing to launch Alien Swarm" window comes and then disappears. The swarm.exe process is running for a couple of seconds, and then it goes away. All my other Steam games lauch fine (Portal, Garry's Mod). Reinstalling takes so much time, so i'd rather try to find a fix first, and see if i can get it to work ^_^
Anyone knows of something?

item.title: Alien Swarm won't start
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
Pouring hot liquid on the icon may help as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Swarm won't start
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
Is it cold outside? Sometimes the game engine has ignition problems when it’s really cold out. Try clicking the shortcut harder.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Swarm won't start
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
It was a joke.

RabidMonkey, verifying worked! Thanks! I totally forgot that function

item.description:
You do realize that Alien Swarm is a free game, right? You want him to insult Valve and then tell them to give him money for free content?

item.title: Alien Swarm won't start
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
If all else fails, call Valve a fag and ask for a refund.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Swarm won't start
item.dc:creator: RabidMonkey
item.description:
Verify the game’s cache contents, first of all.

If that fails, try closing steam, removing the ‘bin’ folder from the alien swarm directory, and then restarting steam.

If all of that fails, restart your computer and try again, before reinstalling.

Read full topic
